What is the minimum transaction fee that can be set using the `settxfee` command?
The minimum transaction fee is not specified, but the `settxfee` command sets the transaction fee per kB, and the amount is rounded to the nearest 0.00000001 VRSC/kB.

settxfee amount

Set the transaction fee per kB.

Arguments:
1. amount     (numeric, required) The transaction fee in VRSC/kB rounded to the nearest 0.00000001

Result
true|false    (boolean) Returns true if successful

Examples:
> verus settxfee 0.00001
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "settxfee", "params": [0.00001] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
